Key Features:

‚úÖ Forever free, no login required
PetPriceCompare.com.au is completely free to use, with no login or registration necessary. Uninstall anytime with just a click.

‚úÖ Automatic price comparison
Our extension seamlessly integrates with your favourite pet retailer websites, instantly revealing the best prices on products that you are looking at. No more manual searching or tab-hopping!

‚úÖ Massive savings
Unlock an average discount of 30% off big-name brands, with nearly half of our deals offering even bigger savings. Keep your wallet happy and your pet happier!

‚úÖ Extensive product coverage
We track prices on tens of thousands of pet products from top retailers, ensuring you'll find incredible deals on all your favourite brands.

‚úÖ All major pet retailers included
Our system updates prices across all major online pet retailers daily. We do the deal hunting, so you can focus on quality time with your beloved companion.
